Package nl.inl.util

Miscellaneous utility functions.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TarGzipReader.FileHandler
    Handles a file inside the .tar.gz archive.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayUtil  
    CapturingReader
    Reader decorator that captures the content in a StringBuilder.
    ChunkedIntList
    Memory-efficient list of integers.
    ChunkedList<T>
    Memory-efficient list of objects.
    ConsoleUtil
    Utilities for simple user input from stdin.
    CountingReader
    A Reader decorator that keeps track of the number of characters read.
    DateUtil
    Utilities for handling dates.
    ExUtil
    Exception utilities
    FileUtil
    Utilities for working with files
    FileUtil.FileTask
    A task to execute on a file.
    IoUtil
    Utilities to do with input/output (streams, writers/reader)
    Json
    Supports reading/writing commented-JSON files.
    Levenshtein
    Subclass of FilteredTermEnum for enumerating all terms that are similar to the specified filter term.
    LevenshteinComparator
    For sorting words by descending similarity to a given target word
    LocaleUtil
    Utilities to do with Locales.
    LogUtil
    Utilities for log4j logging.
    LuceneUtil  
    MemoryUtil
    Utilities to do with JVM memory.
    NetUtil
    Utilities for networking
    OsUtil
    OS-specific utilities
    PropertiesUtil
    Utilities for property files
    ReverseComparator<T>
    Comparator that reverses the sort order of another comparator
    SimpleResourcePool<T>
    Keeps a simple pool of free resource objects.
    StringUtil
    Een collectie reguliere expressies om verschillende patronen uit Strings te filteren.
    TarGzipReader
    Class for handling .tar.gz input streams.
    ThreadPriority
    Allows us to lower thread priority and/or pause thread.
    Timer
    Simple class for measuring elapsed time.
    TimeUtil  
    UnicodeReader
    Reader that skips BOM in UTF-8 (and other Unicode encodings) files.
    Utilities
    Misc.
    VersionFile
    Reads/writes a type/version file for a directory, to indicate the version of the directory's contents.
    XmlUtil
    Utilities for working with XML.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ThreadPriority.Level
    The different priorities a thread can have in our system.

Package nl.inl.util Description

Miscellaneous utility functions. Will probably be moved out of BlackLab and into a separate library of general-purpose utilities.
